mapper.select: SELECT brd_id, brd_key, brd_name, brd_order, brd_use FROM board ORDER BY brd_order DESC, brd_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(brd_id, brd_key, brd_name, brd_order, brd_use) VALUES (board_seq.nextval, UPPER(#{brdKey}), #{brdName}, #{brdOrder}, #{brdUse})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE brd_key = UPPER(#{brdKey})
